Description: Steatite shabti with a short ringletted lappet-wig, a carved face with a short beard, the chest is decorated with a low-relief representation of a Ba-bird with spread wings flanked by the hands in low relief holding the two hoes, the front of the legs is decorated with a column of incised hieroglyphs with a space for the personal name, the back is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket beside a yoke with crossed strings with nu-pots.
